text: Ba in tarz mardumro ʙa holason ogoh kardem to ʙidonand, ki va'dai Xudo rost ast va dar qijomat suʙhae nest. On goh dar ʙorai onho ʙo jakdigar ʙa guftugu pardoxtand va guftand: «Bar rui onho ʙinoe ʙisozed, Parvardigorason ʙa korason ogohtar ast». Va onon, ki ʙar xolason ogohtar suda ʙudand, guftand: «Na, in coro mascide mekunem»
